sourcesContent:
import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import passService from "../../services/pass.services" import * as AlertDialog from '@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog'; import './PassCard.css' const { formatDate } = require('../../utils/formatDate'); const PassCard = ({ date, img, _id, fetchPasses }) => { const handleClick = () => { passService .deletePass(_id) .then(() => fetchPasses()) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) }; return ( {formatDate(date)} < AlertDialog.Overlay className="overlay" /> Â¿Estas completamente seguro? Esta accion no se puede deshacer, se eliminara completamente de la base de datos
) } export default PassCard;
